function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete temperature testing may allow asymptomatic carriers to enter the facility, increasing the risk of disease spread.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of contagious diseases being introduced to the facility and spread among members.","Mitigation":"Implement mandatory temperature testing for all individuals entering the facility.","Technologies":"Infrared temperature scanners.","People":"Members, staff, visitors.","Owner":"Facility management."},{"Description":"Lack of enforcement of mask-wearing may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the facility.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease spread through respiratory droplets in the facility.","Mitigation":"Strictly enforce mask-wearing for all individuals within the facility.","Technologies":"Signages, verbal reminders from staff.","People":"Members, staff, visitors.","Owner":"Facility management."},{"Description":"Limited availability of full body sterilizers and reliance only on hand sanitizers can result in inadequate disinfection of individuals entering the facility.","Impact":"Higher risk of surface transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Provide full body sterilizers at entry points to ensure comprehensive disinfection of individuals.","Technologies":"Full body sterilization chambers.","People":"Members, staff, visitors.","Owner":"Facility management."}]}
